segments.text: Do you mind if I smoke here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I do . I ’ d prefer you didn ’ t . The AC ( air-conditioning ) is also on .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can I just turn off the AC for now and open the window and smoke indoors ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s not a very good idea . It ’ s quite hot outside . Why don ’ t you smoke outside ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It ’ s very hot and that ’ s why I ’ d like to smoke inside .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Though the AC has the air-purifying function . I ’ d still rather have fresh air than smoke . Are you okay with that ?
segments.speaker: S2
